Note that a state of emergency is a governmental declaration which suspends or changes some functions of the executive , the legislative and or the judiciary .
It is a process that alerts citizens to change their normal behaviour and orders government agencies to implement emergency plans .

Governments across the globe often declare a state of emergency during natural or man - made disaster ; during a period of civil unrest , or following a declaration of war or situation of international and or internal armed conflict as it has been in the case of Boko Haram .
And they are often substituted by a martial law .

The proclamation is in line with the protocol of the ICCPR , which agrees that rights and freedoms may be suspended during a state of emergency .
